title: What stuff to buy!? (Nsw , southern tablelands event :Goulburn;)
body: So.. im thinking of setting up a small gaming thingy.. what should i get and in what quantity. I can get tvs with xbones and ps4's pcs with league etc so can i get alist?

replies.body:
Small fee definitely, wear and tear on your stuff. Still cost money for maintenance, more power usage etc.  As long as you dont charge too much, then u effectively are running a business.. look at how much you are allowed to earn b4 mr tax man comes knocking.. Id suggest earn enough to cover strictly maintenance costs. League is free, what about other games you want to run? With xbox and ps4 dont they have montly fees to use over the net now? 
If it was me, id stay with leage and PCs, that already have windows. Sell consoles to put to your funds for lol pcs. Cos you would run into huge snags with consoles. They make money though selling games and making console accounts, league just sells skins to an individuals account. Thats y league is soo good.
